oneShot.title: One-Shot Translation

toneColor.title: Tone Color Preservation
toneColor.desc: Maintains the original speaker's unique voice characteristics and tonal qualities.

emotional.title: Emotional Speech
emotional.desc: AI reproduces emotional nuances, ensuring authentic expression across languages.

lipSync.title: Lip Sync Technology
lipSync.desc: Advanced lip synchronization that perfectly matches mouth movements to translated audio.

subtitle.title: Subtitle Captioner
subtitle.desc: Intelligent subtitle generation with precise timing and natural language flow.

languages.title: 170+ Languages
languages.desc: Translate your content into over 170 languages with native-level accuracy.

styleTransfer.title: Style Transfer
styleTransfer.desc: Apply cinematic or brand-specific styles to your videos with AI-powered visual transformation.
styleTransfer.transcript: This demo transforms a live-action drama clip into a whimsical Ghibli-style animation using AI-driven visual style transfer.

mangaTranslation.title: Manga Translation
mangaTranslation.desc: Automated manga and comic translation with text detection, bubble editing, and cultural adaptation.
mangaTranslation.transcript: This prototype demonstrates automatic manga translation, including speech bubble detection and bilingual in-place editing.

templatedVideo.title: Templated Video Generation
templatedVideo.desc: Create professional videos from templates with AI-generated content and custom branding.
templatedVideo.transcript: This demo shows a scripted-to-video pipeline generating a historical scene about early U.S. history by planning out the storyboard and assembling visuals.
